EXTERNALLY to create an external user. Such a user must be authenticated by an external service, such as an operating system or a third-party service. In this case, Oracle Database relies on authentication by the operating system or third-party service to ensure that a specific external user has access to a specific database user." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">External identification method</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_IDTFT_EXTERNALLYs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify EXTERNALLY to create an external user. Such a user must be authenticated by an external service, such as an operating system or a third-party service. Such a user must be authorized by the enterprise directory service (Oracle Internet Directory)." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Global identification method</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_IDTFT_GLOBALLYs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Lets you create a global user. Such a user must be authorized by the enterprise directory service (Oracle Internet Directory).</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_IDTFT_DIR_DNs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Certificate Dir DN" tooltip="The X.509 name at the enterprise directory service that identifies this user. It should be of the form CN=username,other_attributes, where other_attributes is the rest of the user's distinguished name (DN) in the directory. This form creates a private global schema." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Certificate Dir DN</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_IDTFT_DIR_DNs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The X.509 name at the enterprise directory service that identifies this user. It should be of the form CN=username,other_attributes, where other_attributes is the rest of the user's distinguished name (DN) in the directory. This form creates a private global schema.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_DEFAULT_TABLESPACEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="User's default tablespace" tooltip="Specify the default tablespace for objects that the user creates. If you omit this clause, then the user's objects are stored in the database default tablespace. If no default tablespace has been specified for the database, then the user's objects are stored in the SYSTEM tablespace." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">User's default tablespace</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_DEFAULT_TABLESPACEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify the default tablespace for objects that the user creates. If you omit this clause, then the user's objects are stored in the database default tablespace. If no default tablespace has been specified for the database, then the user's objects are stored in the SYSTEM tablespace.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_TEMP_TABLESPACEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="User's temporary tablespace" tooltip="Specify the tablespace or tablespace group for the user's temporary segments. If you omit this clause, then the user's temporary segments are stored in the database default temporary tablespace or, if none has been specified, in the SYSTEM tablespace." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">User's temporary tablespace</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_TEMP_TABLESPACEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify the tablespace or tablespace group for the user's temporary segments. If you omit this clause, then the user's temporary segments are stored in the database default temporary tablespace or, if none has been specified, in the SYSTEM tablespace.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_QUOTA_SPECs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Quota specification" tooltip="Uses the QUOTA clause to specify the maximum amount of space the user can allocate in the tablespace. You can have multiple QUOTA clauses for multiple tablespaces. "UNLIMITED" lets the user allocate space in the tablespace without bound." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Quota specification</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_QUOTA_SPECs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Uses the QUOTA clause to specify the maximum amount of space the user can allocate in the tablespace. You can have multiple QUOTA clauses for multiple tablespaces. "UNLIMITED" lets the user allocate space in the tablespace without bound.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_PROFILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="User profile" tooltip="Specify the profile you want to assign to the user. The profile limits the amount of database resources the user can use. If you omit this clause, then Oracle Database assigns the DEFAULT profile to the user." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">User profile</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_PROFILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify the profile you want to assign to the user. The profile limits the amount of database resources the user can use. If you omit this clause, then Oracle Database assigns the DEFAULT profile to the user.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_EXPIREs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Password expiration" tooltip="Specify yes if you want the user's password to expire. This setting forces the user or the DBA to change the password before the user can log in to the database." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Password expiration</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_EXPIREs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify yes if you want the user's password to expire. This setting forces the user or the DBA to change the password before the user can log in to the database.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_ACCOUNT_LOCKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Lock user's account" tooltip="Specify YES to lock the user's account and disable access. Specify NO to unlock the user's account and enable access to the account." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Lock user's account</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_ACCOUNT_LOCKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify YES to lock the user's account and disable access. Specify NO to unlock the user's account and enable access to the account.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>
